structure.unit: ADMINISTRATION OF TRUSTS -- LEGAL INVESTMENTS -- UNIFORM PRINCIPAL AND INCOME ACT

law.history: Repealed 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 118, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 14.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Duty to inform and account to beneficiaries.
